GPT_func_description: Determine a target NPC to teleport to.

npc_name.description: The name of the target NPC.

npc_distance.description: The distance from the target NPC.

target_npc_id.description: The ID of the target NPC.

system_prompt_info: `{GPT_func_name}` if requested to move or follow
llm_feedback: {speakerName} is about to teleport to {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. {llm_output_source_names} will mysteriously complete this action and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {speakerName} is about to move towards {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. Begin your response with <veto> if {speakerName} would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
